column6: ULTIMATE CARNAGE PART 4  Discover the origin of Ultimate Carnage and the horror that Dr. Curtis Connors has wrought. And Spider-Man may be helpless to stop it! And don't miss the big showdown between Spider-Man & Carnage!
column8: | penciller:Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
